title: Connect
name: UseDevice
description: Configures the device as the preferred device and tries to connect to it. Everytime a new connection is started the SDK will make 3 attempts to reestablish the connection. If those attempts fail, the connection is considered dead.

parameters.name: device
parameters.notes: This parameter specifies to the system which device you want to use for the operations.

elements.name: ConnectionStatusChanged
elements.description: Each time the card reader state changes (ex : going  from Connected to Disconnected) the ConnectionStatusChanged event is called. It causes the connection manager to invoke this event with the appropriate information.

elements.name: Boolean
elements.description: true if the operation was successful.
